actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which relate to the checkoff procedure for financing presidential election campaigns.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of law under the Internal Revenue Code which relate to the checkoff procedure for financing presidential election campaigns. (Repeals 26 U.S.C. 6096)

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which relate to the checkoff procedure for financing presidential election campaigns.
